confirm_discovery.description: Do you want to add your HEOS devices to Home Assistant?
confirm_discovery.title: Discovered HEOS System

reauth_confirm.description: Please update your HEOS Account credentials. Alternatively, you can clear the credentials if you do not want the integration to access favorites, playlists, and streaming services.
reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate HEOS

reconfigure.description: Change the host name or IP address of the HEOS-capable product used to access your HEOS System.
reconfigure.title: Reconfigure HEOS

data_description.host: Host name or IP address of a HEOS-capable product (preferably one connected via wire to the network).

user.description: Please enter the host name or IP address of a HEOS-capable product to access your HEOS System.
user.title: Connect to HEOS

entity_not_grouped.message: Entity {entity_id} is not joined to a group

integration_not_loaded.message: The HEOS integration is not loaded

not_heos_media_player.message: Entity {entity_id} is not a HEOS media player entity

sign_in_auth_error.message: Failed to sign in: Invalid username and/or password

sign_in_out_deprecated.description: Actions 'heos.sign_in' and 'heos.sign_out' are deprecated and will be removed in the 2025.8.0 release. Enter your HEOS Account credentials in the configuration options and the integration will manage authentication automatically.
sign_in_out_deprecated.title: HEOS Actions Deprecated

data_description.password: The password to your HEOS Account.
data_description.username: The username or email address of your HEOS Account.

init.description: You can sign in to your HEOS Account to access favorites, streaming services, and other features. Clearing the credentials will sign out of your account.
init.title: HEOS options

get_queue.description: Retrieves the queue of the media player.
get_queue.name: Get queue

group_volume_set.description: Sets the group's volume while preserving member volume ratios.

volume_level.description: The volume. 0 is inaudible, 1 is the maximum volume.
volume_level.name: Level

group_volume_set.name: Set group volume

move_queue_item.description: Moves one or more items within the play queue.

destination_position.description: The position index in the queue to move the items to.
destination_position.name: Destination position

queue_ids.description: The IDs (indexes) of the items in the queue to move.
queue_ids.name: Queue IDs

move_queue_item.name: Move queue item

remove_from_queue.description: Removes items from the play queue.

queue_ids.description: The IDs (indexes) of the items in the queue to remove.
queue_ids.name: Queue IDs

remove_from_queue.name: Remove from queue

sign_in.description: Signs in to a HEOS account.

password.description: The password of the HEOS account.
password.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::password%]

username.description: The username or email of the HEOS account.
username.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::username%]

sign_in.name: Sign in

sign_out.description: Signs out of the HEOS account.
sign_out.name: Sign out
